metadata.Title: CVE-2023-43770 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Roundcube before 1.4.14, 1.5.x before 1.5.4, and 1.6.x before 1.6.3 allows XSS via text/plain e-mail messages with crafted links because of program/lib/Roundcube/rcube_string_replacer.php behavior.

criterions.comment: roundcube: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
